title: German Potato Salad
directions: 1 Heat the potatoes and broth in a 6-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Cover and cook for 20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender.
2 Stir the vinegar, onion, mustard, sugar, bacon and parsley in a large bowl.
3 Pour the potato and broth mixture into the bowl with the vinegar mixture and stir to coat. Let stand for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Season to taste.
ingredients: 10 medium Yukon gold potatoes (about 4 pounds), cut into 1-inch pieces (about 12 cups)
2 1/4 cups Swanson® Beef Broth or Swanson® 50% Less Sodium Beef Broth
